ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the week to play: Every Time of day: 7pm EST (You try camping the Knight room in Unrest with no
ygData.messageBody:
When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: Every

Time of day: 7pm EST (You try camping the Knight room in Unrest with no
one in the bar.)

Longest stretch of continuous play: 6 hours

Way to have game sounds: None, sound card currently causes BSOD (hence my
personal description reads, "Norrath's only deaf bard")

Distance to sit from display: 6-18" (Human limitations, now enhanced by
Voracious Concord)

TV show to have on: No TV show can compare to online interaction

Music to listen to: Anything between Rennaisance and Romantic periods
(1600s-1800s)

Beverage (non-alcoholic): water

Beverage (alcoholic): water?

Health Food: College cafeteria, "health food" is an oxymoron

Junk Food: see Health Food

Clothes to wear: Medium bronze br--oh you mean me, shirt and shorts
